pageContext.signature:
Artist's insignia bottom 'HBG', date '1521' and name 'HERMAN'
[KKL 2020]

additionalTextInformation.text:
The woodcut is dated and signed. The interwoven monogram HGB (= Hans Grien Baldung) and the year 1521 can be read on the book cover, which is decorated with a hump and surrounding ornamental band.  In addition, early prints of the woodcut have "HERMAN" cut in majuscules on the inner edge of the book. It can be assumed that this refers to the engraver Hans Herman, who is first mentioned in a Strasbourg print from 1516. 
[KKL 2020]
